description: Mix up your burger night with this sensational burger recipe. Grilled haloumi takes these burgers up a notch and you can't go wrong with sweet potato fries.
name: Beef, Haloumi & Sweet Chilli Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 375 g frozen sweet potato straight cut chips

recipeInstructions.text: Spread bun bases with mayonnaise and top with rocket, tomato, onion, haloumi, burger patties and sauce. Sandwich with bun tops. Serve burgers with chips.
Spread bun bases with mayonnaise and top with rocket, tomato, onion, haloumi, burger patties and sauce. Sandwich with bun tops. Serve burgers with chips.
